title: Expo Content Recommendation System
subtitle: Interactive Decision Framework for Building a Custom Recommendation Pipeline

phases.name: Initialization
phases.description: How should we set up initial recommendations?

options.question: Use booth metadata for content-based filtering?
options.description: Match booths using keywords, categories, and descriptions

options.question: Use collaborative filtering?
options.description: Recommend booths that similar visitors also visited

options.question: Should walking distance be factored?
options.description: Prioritize nearby booths to reduce walking time

options.question: Factor in time-sensitive events?
options.description: Consider scheduled demos, seminars, and workshops

options.question: Will paid advertisement be offered to boost rankings?
options.description: Allow exhibitors to pay for higher placement in recommendations

nodes.question: Initial recommendations
nodes.description: Should recommendations be pre-generated for each user before the start of the event?

nodes.question: Profile-based initialization
nodes.description: Is there enough information about users to generate initial recommendations? Sources of information might be interest sections or keywords from registration data, or usage analytics from event web/mobile pages.

nodes.title: Profile-based initialization
nodes.description: Generate initial recommendations based on pre-event user profile data.

nodes.question: Generic initialization
nodes.description: Should a generic set of initial recommendations be generated for all users?

nodes.title: Generate Generic Recommendations
nodes.description: Manually generate generic set of initial recommendations for all users.

nodes.title: No Initial Recommendations
nodes.description: Do not generate initial recommendations.

nodes.title: Real-Time Tracking
nodes.description: Track booth visits, dwell time, and optional app interactions

nodes.question: Booth metadata available?
nodes.description: Do we have keywords, categories, or descriptions for each booth?

nodes.title: Content-Based Filtering
nodes.description: Match booths using keywords, categories, and website content

nodes.title: Collaborative Filtering
nodes.description: Recommend booths that similar visitors also visited

nodes.question: Apply constraints?
nodes.description: Should we factor in distance, capacity, or time-based events?

nodes.title: Proximity Weighting
nodes.description: Prioritize nearby booths to reduce walking time

nodes.title: Crowd Management
nodes.description: Avoid recommending overcrowded booths

nodes.title: Time-Sensitive Events
nodes.description: Factor in scheduled demos, seminars, and workshops

nodes.question: Mobile app availability
nodes.description: Is there an official event mobile app?

nodes.question: Developer access
nodes.description: Do you have developer access to customize the mobile app?

nodes.question: Existing agenda feature
nodes.description: Does the app already have an agenda or schedule feature?

nodes.title: Build recommendation display
nodes.description: Need to build recommendation display UI from scratch.

nodes.title: External integration only
nodes.description: Limited to external integration via webhooks and notifications.

nodes.title: Alternative delivery channels
nodes.description: Deliver recommendations via email, SMS, web portal, or physical kiosks.

nodes.question: Push notifications
nodes.description: Can we send push notifications to attendees?

nodes.title: Passive updates only
nodes.description: Updates will be passive (pull-based, in-app badge only).

nodes.question: Offer real-time updates?
nodes.description: Recommendations update automatically every 5-10 minutes

nodes.title: Real-time updates enabled
nodes.description: Recommendations update automatically every 5-10 minutes.

nodes.question: Offer on-demand updates?
nodes.description: Users pull to refresh recommendations when desired

nodes.title: On-demand updates enabled
nodes.description: Users pull to refresh recommendations when desired.

nodes.title: Scheduled updates
nodes.description: Recommendations refresh at fixed intervals (hourly, per session).

nodes.question: Privacy & opt-out
nodes.description: Allow attendees to opt out of tracking and recommendations?

nodes.title: ✓ Done - Privacy controls enabled
nodes.description: Include consent management and opt-out toggle for attendees.

nodes.title: ✓ Done - Mandatory participation
nodes.description: All attendees participate in recommendation system.
